name: openeconomy-trade
description: Decentralized skill exchange protocol - fair trade between people

scripts.chain:local: cd contracts && npm run hardhat node
scripts.contracts:compile: cd contracts && npm run hardhat compile
scripts.contracts:test: cd contracts && npm run hardhat test
scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npm run hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.contracts:deploy:mumbai: cd contracts && npm run hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mumbai

author: OpenEconomy Contributors
